question: Which among the following is correct about Chronostratigraphy?
option1: It is the study of plates and plate tectonics
option2: It is study of the flow of rivers and its evolution
option3: It is the study of age of rock with relation to time
option4: It is the study of mountains and their evolution
answer: It is the study of age of rock with relation to time
explanation: Chronostratigraphy is the branch of stratigraphy which studies the age of the rock strata with relation to time.
